sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: Zend_Service_Ebay is a simple group of APIs for using eBay web services.

Zend_Service_Ebay implements the eBay APIs:
Finding.
In order to use Zend_Service_Ebay, you should already have an eBay Application ID. To get a key and for more information, please visit the eBay Developers Program web site.

note.title: Attention
note.para: Your Application ID is linked to your eBay identity, so take appropriate measures to keep them private.
